entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@IngrahamAngle Article II of the Chemical Weapons Convention bans the use of the same chemicals during war that Trump deployed on righteous peaceful protestors outside the White House on Monday.
Using TEAR gas on his own citizens during a COVID19 pandemic will likely cause a deadly results.
